login.heading: Login
login.subheading: Enter your email to login to your gorbhoshongi account
login.signUpLink: Don't have an account? Sign up
login.passwordDescription: Enter a strong password (8+ characters, mix of letters, numbers & symbols)
login.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
login.passwordNeedsDigit: Password must contain at least one digit
login.passwordNeedsLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
login.passwordNeedsUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
login.passwordNeedsSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character

register.heading: Sign Up
register.passwordDescription: Enter a strong password (8+ characters, mix of letters, numbers & symbols)
register.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
register.passwordNeedsDigit: Password must contain at least one digit
register.passwordNeedsLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
register.passwordNeedsUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
register.passwordNeedsSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character
